photo: Photo by Erwan Hesry on unsplash.com
footer_description: show spelling and inflection in line with official Norwegian spelling. The Language Council and the University of Bergen are behind the dictionaries.

split_inf.title: split infinitive
split_inf.label: More information about split infinitive
content: If you use split infinitive, the infinitive form of this verb will have the suffix

settings.title: Settings
settings.cookie_prompt: For technical reasons we need to use cookies to store your settings for later. This is only used to enhance your user experience, and we do not use these cookies to track your activity.
settings.inflection_table_context: Show context for participle forms in the inflection tables
settings.submit_select: Select search query when submitting search
settings.auto_select: Select search term automatically after search

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Default language settings for the language of headings, buttons, messages, and menus. The settings will not affect examples and definitions: the Bokmål dictionary will remain in Bokmål and the Nynorsk dictionary stays Nynorsk

dict.title: Default dictionaries
dict.description: Default dictionary settings for which of the dictionaries to be queried when using ordbokene.no. The settings will not affect current searches or links to searches in dictionaries. To change the dictionary during use, change the settings temporarily via the menu to the right of the search field.

collapse.description: Default search presentation settings. Choose between seeing complete articles, article excepts or an automatically generated presentation.
collapse.auto: Auto (exerpts when more than two results)

notifications.redirect: Showing senses of the dictionary entry
notifications.translation: Click the suggestions below to add translation based on the translation software Apertium and the glossary {adm} from the The Language Council of Norway.
notifications.ignored_words: The search was ignored because we limit queries to 20 words.
notifications.ignored_chars: The search was ignored because we do not accept words with more than 40 characters.
suggest_dict: Did you search in the wrong dictionary?

fulltext.title: Full-text search
fulltext.description: Your query yields results in advanced search with full-text search enabled.

no_results.title: No results
description: Your search yields no results in {dict}
Note that thera are endless ways of combining words into new compound words in Norwegian, and many such words are therefore not included in the dictionary.

feedback.title: Did you find the word you were looking for?

caption.VERBPP: Inflection table for the participles of this verb
caption.ADJCS: Inflection table for this adjective (comparative, superlative)

cite_description: If you want to cite this article in the
we recommend that you state when the article was retrieved (read), e. g. as follows:
article.citation: « {lemma} ». In: {dict}. Språkrådet & Universitetet i Bergen. {link} ( retrieved {dd}. {mm}. {yyyy}).

404.title: Not Found
404.description: The page may have been deleted or moved, or you may have used an invalid link.

503.title: 503: Unavailable service
503.description: The server is temporarily overloaded or under maintenance.

server.title: Server Error
server.description: Something went wrong on the server side.

generic_code.title: Error
generic_code.description: An unexpected error occurred while communicating with the server.

network.title: Connection Error
network.description: A network problem prevented the page from loading. Please try reloading the page or check if you are connected to the internet.

error.no_article: The server could not find an article with ID {id}. The article may have been deleted or moved, or you may have used an invalid link.
